Package cambio.simulator.entities.patterns

Interface LoadBalancingStrategy

public interface LoadBalancingStrategy
Interface for a load balancing strategy.

Implementations will be provided a collection of running instances and should be able to select one of these as next target.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static LoadBalancingStrategy fromName​(desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent someModelComponent, String type)
    Converts the given type identifier into a LoadBalancingStrategy instance.
    MicroserviceInstance getNextInstance​(Collection<MicroserviceInstance> runningInstances)
    Searches through the list of available instances to find the most suitable to receive the next request.

  • Method Details

    • fromName

      static LoadBalancingStrategy fromName​(desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent someModelComponent, String type)
      Converts the given type identifier into a LoadBalancingStrategy instance.
      Parameters:
      someModelComponent - A ModelComponent that can be used for potentially sending warning messages.
      type - type identifier of the strategy (e.g. "even","random" or "util")
      Returns:
      the parsed LoadBalancingStrategy or a RandomLoadBalanceStrategy if the type is unknown.

    • getNextInstance

      MicroserviceInstance getNextInstance​(Collection<MicroserviceInstance> runningInstances)
      Searches through the list of available instances to find the most suitable to receive the next request.
      Parameters:
      runningInstances - collection of all currently running instances.
      Returns:
      the MicroserviceInstance to which the next request should be send.
